[![](https://i1.wp.com/photos1.flickr.com/2195937_0ba61b86ae.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/2195937/ "photo sharing") [Gator’s Eye](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/2195937/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
I’m starting to upload my Florida pics to Flickr. I’ll post some chioce ones here, but you can see the whole lot by visiting [my Flickr stream](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/) or subscribing to its [feed](http://www.flickr.com/services/feeds/photos_public.gne?id=44124385392@N01&format=atom_03).
